survey_name: AI-Powered Home Assistant User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on AI-powered home assistants to improve functionality, usability, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your AI-powered home assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your AI-powered home assistant?

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied usage patterns.
